nodes.text: Elizabeth Eve Wein is the author of "Change of Heart," a short story which appears in the anthology From a Certain Point of View, celebrating the 40th anniversary of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. She has also written the junior novel Cobalt Squadron, a tie-in to to the film The Last Jedi, which was released on the same day as the film and provided the backstory for new characters introduced in it, Rose and Paige Tico.
She has a private pilot's licence, and ever since she first flew, she wanted to write about it.
